name: internals
description: - [thread.js](./threads.js): default thread pool size 4 - [thread_2.js](./threads_2.js): reduce thread pool size to 2 - [thread_5.js](./threads_5.js): increasing thread pool size to 5 - [async.js](./async.js): delegating http call to os async helpers - [multitask.js](./multitask.js): interaction of os async modules outside of thread pool; fs read, and hash in thread pool
